content: I'm posting this here because I'm not sure what's going on and I don't *think* this was happening before. When I use the FHIR 1.8 igpublisher jar to build an IG, external non-FHIR value set references are getting stripped of the first nine letters -- resulting in broken links. For example, instead of http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/ValueSet/daf-observation-ccdasmokingstatus, it's getting rendered as 7.org/fhir/us/core/ValueSet/daf-observation-ccdasmokingstatus. Is this happening because I don't formally note us-core as a dependency in my IG config files? Or is it something else?
Definitely a bug. Please submit a tracker
Sorry, ig publishing is growing in bug numbers this week as we close out r3. Will get better next week
